meanings.definition: A person who owns and manages a business or property.
meanings.sent1: The proprietor of the store greeted every customer with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The proprietor of the hotel ensured that all guests had a comfortable stay.
meanings.sent3: The proprietor of the bakery accidentally added too much sugar to the cake, making it extra sweet.
meanings.sent4: As the proprietor of the farm, she nurtured the land like it was her own child.
meanings.sent5: The proprietor of the antique shop had a keen eye for valuable items.

meanings.definition: The owner of a business or property.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, the proprietor of the restaurant would open the doors for customers.
meanings.sent2: The proprietor of the apartment building made sure all maintenance tasks were completed on time.
meanings.sent3: The proprietor of the amusement park accidentally dropped his ice cream cone on a rollercoaster ride.
meanings.sent4: She was the proprietor of the bookstore, where stories came to life on the shelves.
meanings.sent5: The proprietor of the vineyard carefully tended to each grapevine, ensuring a bountiful harvest.
